front.title: EDNS0 Option for Indicating AAAA Record Synthesis and Format

abstract.t: Advanced hosts and applications benefit of the knowledge of an IPv6address, AAAA record, synthesis taking place in the network. Thisdraft proposes new ENDS0 option for communicating the synthesis istaking place, used address format, and the IPv6 prefix and suffixused by the DNS64. The communicated information enables hosts toperform local IPv6 address synthesis.
